author: Reinette LeJeune
title: Renpho solar-powered smart scale tracks 13 essential body measurements for new $24 low
text:
Renpho Solar Power Smart Scale for $23.99 shipped , after clipping the on-page 40% off coupon . Released earlier this year, this smart bathroom scale has only received two previous discounts that brought the overall price down by increments of $10 each, with today’s deal nearly doubling the savings and landing as a new all-time low. With an eco-friendly solar-powered design, this scale uses high-precision manganese steel sensors to track and give readings on 13 essential body composition measurements: weight, BMI, body fat, visceral fat, subcutaneous fat, skeletal muscle, BMR, bone mass, metabolic age, fat-free bodyweight, body water, protein, and muscle mass. You can sync the scale with the Renpho Health app to track your progress over time – all while simultaneously being able to integrate with other health tracking apps like Samsung Health, Fitbit, Google Fit, and Apple Health. Head below to read more.
You can also earn extra savings when you bundle the above deal with two particular RENPHO devices. The first is a Renpho Cordless Jump Rope for $25 , after clipping the on-page 15% off coupon . The second is a Renpho Smart Jump Rope for $17 , after clipping the on-page 15% off coupon . Both items will receive an extra 5% off when you take advantage of this bundle offer.
You can also head over to our fitness tracker hub for more workout tech deals.
Renpho Solar Power Smart Scale features: Eco-Friendly Design: The use of solar technology for charging makes this scale a sustainable and eco-friendly choice. It helps you save money on battery replacements and reduces the environmental impact of disposable batteries. Precision and Capacity: The scale features high-precision manganese steel sensors, providing accurate readings in small increments of 0.2 lb or 0.05 kg. It has a substantial weight capacity of up to 400 lbs or 180 kg. Comprehensive Body Composition Data: This smart scale provides 13 essential body composition measurements, including body weight, body fat, BMI, muscle mass, and bone mass. It’s suitable for various health and fitness goals, from weight loss to muscle gain. Multi-User Support: The scale can store profiles for unlimited users, making it suitable for families or roommates who want to monitor their health and fitness together. It even has a Baby Scale Mode for tracking the weight of babies or pets.

author: Nouvelles
title: Ronnie O'Sullivan salue le déménagement de Judd Trump à Hong Kong suite à sa propre décision de résidence
text:
Ronnie O’Sullivan et insérer une photo (à droite) : Judd Trump.
26 décembre 2024 – (Hong Kong) Judd Trump a officiellement élu domicile à Hong Kong, suivant les traces de son compatriote Ronnie O’Sullivan. La résidence de Trump a été confirmée cette semaine après avoir réussi à suivre le Quality Migrant Admission Scheme, un programme conçu pour attirer des professionnels qualifiés dans la région.
O’Sullivan, qui a établi sa résidence deux mois auparavant, n’a exprimé que peu de surprise face à la décision de Trump, soulignant l’attrait de l’environnement fiscal favorable de Hong Kong. Même si les ressortissants étrangers sont toujours soumis à l’impôt sur le revenu, les taux à Hong Kong sont parmi les plus bas des économies développées, ce qui en fait une option attrayante pour de nombreux expatriés.
Lors d’une récente interview, O’Sullivan a fait remarquer : « Cela a du sens puisque [Trump’s] ma petite amie vient de Hong Kong. Il aime être ici plus qu’au Royaume-Uni. Il a également indiqué son désir d’améliorer la visibilité du snooker à Hong Kong en créant des clubs et des académies pour développer les talents locaux.
La relation de Trump avec la patineuse artistique de Hong Kong Maisy Ma Hiu-ching a joué un rôle central dans sa décision de déménager. Il a reçu sa carte d’identité de Hong Kong le 23 décembre, marquant un nouveau chapitre de sa carrière alors qu’il cherche à approfondir ses liens avec la ville. «Je veux la rendre fière, ainsi que ma famille», a déclaré Trump, soulignant les motivations personnelles qui ont façonné son récent regain de performance.
La relation entre les deux hommes a commencé lors du Masters 2022 à Hong Kong, et malgré les défis initiaux posés par la distance, leur reconnexion cette année a solidifié l’engagement de Trump envers la région. Alors qu’il se prépare pour le prochain Macao Snooker Masters 2024, Trump est optimiste quant à la possibilité de combiner ses ambitions professionnelles avec sa vie personnelle à Hong Kong, renforçant ainsi sa présence dans la communauté locale dynamique.
#Ronnie #OSullivan #salue #déménagement #Judd #Trump #Hong #Kong #suite #propre #décision #résidence

author: 证星财报简析
title: 海看股份（301262）2025年一季报简析：净利润增7.45%，公司应收账款体量较大_股票频道_证券之星
text:
据证券之星公开数据整理，近期海看股份（301262）发布2025年一季报。截至本报告期末，公司营业总收入2.35亿元，同比下降3.28%，归母净利润1.17亿元，同比上升7.45%。按单季度数据看，第一季度营业总收入2.35亿元，同比下降3.28%，第一季度归母净利润1.17亿元，同比上升7.45%。本报告期海看股份公司应收账款体量较大，当期应收账款占最新年报归母净利润比达163.71%。
本次财报公布的各项数据指标表现一般。其中，毛利率55.25%，同比减1.27%，净利率49.75%，同比增11.09%，销售费用、管理费用、财务费用总计1170.15万元，三费占营收比4.97%，同比增27.37%，每股净资产8.83元，同比增4.02%，每股经营性现金流0.77元，同比增877.67%，每股收益0.28元，同比增7.69%
证券之星价投圈财报分析工具显示： 业务评价： 公司去年的ROIC为10.63%，资本回报率一般。然而去年的净利率为40.9%，算上全部成本后，公司产品或服务的附加值极高。 偿债能力： 公司现金资产非常健康。 融资分红： 公司上市2年以来，累计融资总额12.60亿元，累计分红总额6.20亿元，分红融资比为0.49。
财报体检工具显示： 建议关注公司应收账款状况（应收账款/利润已达163.71%） 以上内容为证券之星据公开信息整理，由智能算法生成（网信算备310104345710301240019号），不构成投资建议。

author: Enviroliteracy Team
title: Why do all my fish look pale?
text:
Why Do All My Fish Look Pale? Unraveling the Mystery of Fading Colors in Your Aquarium Seeing your vibrant, colorful fish suddenly looking washed out and pale can be alarming. The most common reason is stress caused by poor water quality . Imagine your fish living in a polluted environment – that’s essentially what happens when ammonia, nitrites, and nitrates build up in the tank. This toxicity irritates their skin and weakens their immune system, leading to a loss of color. However, several other factors can contribute to this unwelcome change, from disease and diet to bullying within the aquarium community. Let’s dive deeper into the potential culprits and how you can bring back the vibrancy to your aquatic companions.
Identifying the Culprits Behind Color Loss Understanding why your fish are losing color requires a bit of detective work. Consider these potential causes:
Water Quality: This is, by far, the most frequent offender. Ammonia and nitrite are highly toxic to fish, even in small amounts. Nitrates , while less toxic, can still cause stress at elevated levels. Regularly test your water using a reliable test kit to ensure parameters are within acceptable ranges. A pH imbalance (too high or too low) can also irritate fish and affect their coloration. Stress: Stressors abound in an aquarium environment. These can include: Overcrowding: Too many fish in a small space leads to competition and increased waste production. Aggression: Bullying from tankmates can cause chronic stress, suppressing their immune system and affecting color. Sudden Changes: Rapid changes in temperature, pH, or water chemistry can shock fish. Inadequate Hiding Places: Fish need secure spots to retreat to when feeling threatened. Disease: Several diseases can manifest as a loss of color. Ich (White Spot Disease): While characterized by white spots, Ich can also cause overall paleness. Fungal Infections: These can appear as cotton-like growths and lead to discoloration. Parasitic Infestations: Internal or external parasites can drain a fish’s energy and affect its appearance. Diet: A lack of essential nutrients and pigments in the diet can impact color. Fish require a varied diet rich in carotenoids (found in foods like shrimp, spirulina, and certain vegetables) to maintain vibrant colors. Age: As fish age, their colors may naturally fade to some extent. This is a normal part of the aging process, but it should be gradual, not sudden. Lighting: Insufficient or improper lighting can affect how colors appear. Some fish require specific light spectrums to display their best coloration. Genetics: In some cases, the fish may simply have genes that predispose them to paler coloration. Restoring Vibrancy: Taking Action Once you’ve identified the likely cause, take swift action to remedy the situation.
Test Your Water: This is the first and most crucial step. Use a reliable test kit to check for ammonia, nitrite, nitrate, and pH . Perform a Water Change: If water parameters are out of whack, perform a partial water change (25-50%) to dilute the pollutants. Use a water conditioner to remove chlorine and chloramine from tap water. Address the Source of Stress: Identify and eliminate any stressors. This might involve rehoming aggressive fish, providing more hiding places, or reducing the number of fish in the tank. Improve Filtration: Ensure your filter is adequately sized for your tank and that it’s functioning properly. Regular filter maintenance is essential. Adjust Your Fish’s Diet: Provide a high-quality diet that is rich in carotenoids . Consider supplementing with color-enhancing foods. Treat Diseases: If you suspect a disease, consult with a veterinarian specializing in fish or a knowledgeable aquarium store staff member. Quarantine affected fish to prevent the spread of infection. Optimize Lighting: Research the specific lighting requirements of your fish species and adjust your lighting accordingly. Preventing Future Issues Prevention is always better than cure. By following these guidelines, you can minimize the risk of your fish losing their color:
Maintain Excellent Water Quality: Regularly test your water and perform water changes to keep pollutants at bay. Choose Compatible Tankmates: Research the temperament of different fish species before introducing them to your tank. Provide a Varied Diet: Feed your fish a balanced diet that includes a variety of foods. Observe Your Fish Regularly: Watch for signs of stress or illness and take action promptly. Quarantine New Fish: Quarantine new fish for several weeks before adding them to your main tank to prevent the introduction of diseases. Adequate Tank Size: Ensure that your tank is large enough to house your fish at their adult size. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. Why is my fish turning white instead of just pale? Turning completely white can indicate a severe health issue. It could be a serious fungal infection, a parasitic infestation , or even a sign of advanced age . Severely stressed fish might also exhibit extreme color loss. Immediate investigation and treatment are essential.
2. What are the ideal water parameters for most freshwater fish? While specific parameters vary by species, general guidelines include:
Ammonia: 0 ppm Nitrite: 0 ppm Nitrate: Under 20 ppm (ideally lower) pH: Between 6.5 and 7.5 (most freshwater fish) 3. How often should I perform water changes? A general rule of thumb is to perform a 25-50% water change every 1-2 weeks . However, this depends on the size of your tank, the number of fish, and the effectiveness of your filtration system.
4. What is the best way to test my aquarium water? Liquid test kits are generally more accurate than test strips. However, test strips are more convenient for quick checks.
5. What are some color-enhancing foods for fish? Foods rich in carotenoids include krill, shrimp, spirulina, algae wafers , and commercial color-enhancing fish foods.
6. Can stress stripes cause my fish to look pale? Yes, stress stripes, especially in fish like cichlids, are often a sign of stress and can appear as a washed-out or paler coloration. This is a clear indicator of distress, like the stress of being bullied.
7. How do I know if my fish are being bullied? Signs of bullying include hiding, fin nipping, chasing, and physical injuries . The bullied fish may also appear pale and listless.
8. Is it possible for fish to change color naturally? Yes, some fish species can change color in response to their environment or mood. However, this is usually a temporary change, not a permanent loss of color.
9. Does lack of oxygen make fish lose color? Yes, a lack of oxygen is a significant stressor for fish. They may turn pale due to the stress and struggling to breathe.
10. How do I know if my fish has Ich? Ich is characterized by small, white spots that resemble grains of salt sprinkled on the fish’s body and fins. The fish may also rub against objects in the tank.
11. What are the symptoms of ammonia poisoning in fish? Symptoms of ammonia poisoning include gasping at the surface, red or inflamed gills, lethargy, and loss of appetite .
12. My new fish is pale. Is this normal? It’s common for new fish to be pale due to the stress of being transported and introduced to a new environment. Provide them with a comfortable environment and monitor them closely. If the paleness persists, investigate further.
13. Can the type of substrate affect fish color? Yes, a dark substrate can often enhance the colors of fish. A brighter substrate can sometimes cause fish to appear paler as they try to blend in.
14. Why is my fish at the top of the tank? Fish at the top of the tank can be due to a number of reasons, including lack of oxygen , high levels of ammonia , nitrite or nitrate , or even disease .
15. Is it possible to revive a dying fish? In some cases, yes. If the fish’s condition is due to lack of oxygen, moving it to well-aerated water may help. However, if the fish is suffering from a severe illness, the chances of recovery are slim.
Maintaining a healthy and vibrant aquarium requires diligent care and attention. By understanding the potential causes of color loss in fish and taking proactive steps to address them, you can ensure that your aquatic companions thrive and display their full beauty. For more information on aquatic environments and responsible environmental practices, visit The Environmental Literacy Council at enviroliteracy.org .

author: Raúl Salgado
title: Álvaro Sanz: "El grupo es una buena piña, eso nos va a dar muchos puntos" | Radio Ferrol | Cadena SER
text: El futbolista del Racing Álvaro Sanz ha afirmado este jueves que el vestuario está «muy unido» y que sus integrantes permanecen «tranquilos» pese a las dos derrotas cosechadas en las últimas jornadas. Ante esos resultados negativos, ha reivindicado que llegarán «pronto los tres puntos». En rueda de prensa, el jugador ha incidido en que el campeonato está todavía en su tramo de «inicio; han llegado dos nuevos y nos estamos adaptando al estilo de juego». Así, ha subrayado que el «ambiente es bueno» y que restan «39 jornadas» del campeonato en Segunda División. «El grupo es una buena piña y eso es lo que nos va a dar muchos puntos», ha apostillado el mediocentro. Además, ha admitido que la lesión el pasado domingo de Aitor Buñuel, que será intervenido este viernes tras su golpe fortuito con un rival, «nos dejó en shock». Sanz le ha deseado «una pronta recuperación para que esté con nosotros lo antes posible». Al mismo tiempo, ha expresado que los fichajes de Bebé y Rober Correa, confirmados este martes, aportarán un «aire necesario para que cuando una posición esté tocada los demás puedan tener descanso». En el ámbito individual, se ha mostrado «muy contento porque poco a poco me voy adaptando». Ha recalcado que se van «conociendo todos» los jugadores, de los que ha dicho que les «falta acoplarnos a la idea» del entrenador, Cristóbal Parralo, y «entender su modo de juego». «Una vez que todos lo cojamos y vayan pasando las jornadas tendremos las ideas claras», ha aludido, en referencia al «perfil ofensivo que nos falta ahora». Finalmente, ha añadido que la temporada es «muy larga» y que se requiere «paciencia, acoplarnos a las ideas del entrenador y acabar de conocernos».

author: NewsBreak Original
title: 'Clearly it is a huge frustration!' Prince Harry 'not trying to become a working royal'
text:
By GB News Videos ,
54 minutes ago
Prince Harry is "trying to go at it alone" and is "not trying to become a working royal" again, GB News royal correspondent Cameron Walker has claimed.The Duke of Sussex dramatically quit his role as a working royal in January 2020 and moved the US with his wife Meghan Markle.The pair have since launched scathing attacks on life in the Royal Family in the form of interviews and Harry's memoir titled Spare.However, recently the pair seem to be taking part in events that would usually be seen as royal duties such as their recent tour of Nigeria and Harry's work with a children's charity.Speaking on GB News today host Tom Hardwood asked GB News royal correspondent Cameron Walker: "Because we've seen some senior royals step back, three senior Royals, one in hospital, two regularly visiting for treatment."Do you think that's encouraged Prince Harry to take on that perhaps more responsible role that you were talking about?"Walker explained: "I don't think it's to do with we're losing members of the Royal Family temporarily, such as the Princess of Wales and Princess Anne."I think he's trying to go it alone. I don't think this is him trying to become a working member of the Royal Family again."I think he is pretty happy in California from the messages we are getting from him, but clearly it is a huge frustration."I think perhaps for those royal watchers and those royal fans who think what could have been if he stayed as a working member and how much he could have perhaps helped."READ THE FULL STORY HERE
